CustomField.description: This field is used as the federation identifier for users requiring SSO logging into MyNetwork community. This is required in scenarios where the user has an additional user account that uses SSO in either CRM core or another community.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used as the federation identifier for users requiring SSO logging into MyNetwork community. This is required in scenarios where the user has an additional user account that uses SSO in either CRM core or another community.
CustomField.label: MyNetwork Federation Identifier
